parameters.name: dataSourceName
parameters.description: The name of the data source.

parameters.name: deployName
parameters.description: The name of the data center.

parameters.name: dryRun
parameters.description: Specifies whether to perform only a dry run, without performing the actual request. The system only checks the validity of the data source. Valid values: true and false.

parameters.name: generationId
parameters.description: The ID of the full index version.
